title: Required: A title or a brief phrase summarizing the reported finding.
uid: Required: The unique identifier of the reported finding.
created_time: Optional: The time when the finding was created.
desc: Optional: The description of the reported finding.
first_seen_time: Optional: The time when the finding was first observed.
last_seen_time: Optional: The time when the finding was most recently observed.
modified_time: Optional: The time when the finding was last modified.
product: Optional: Details about the product that reported the finding.
product_uid: Optional: The unique identifier of the product that reported the finding.
remediation: Optional: Description by a user about how remediation happened
src_url: Optional: The URL pointing to the source of the finding.
supporting_data: Optional: Any supporting information about the finding.
types: Optional: One or more types of the reported finding.
